description: Manage Azure NetApp Files (ANF) Backup Resources.

commands.name: az netappfiles account backup-vault backup create
commands.summary: Create a backup under the Backup Vault.
commands.syntax:
az netappfiles account backup-vault backup create --account-name
                                                  --backup-name
                                                  --backup-vault-name
                                                  --resource-group
                                                  --volume-resource-id
                                                  [--label]
                                                  [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                  [--snapshot-name]
                                                  [--use-existing-snapshot {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]

commands.name: az netappfiles account backup-vault backup create
commands.summary: Create a backup under the Backup Vault.
commands.syntax:
az netappfiles account backup-vault backup create --account-name
                                                  --backup-name
                                                  --backup-vault-name
                                                  --resource-group
                                                  --volume-resource-id
                                                  [--label]
                                                  [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                  [--snapshot-name]
                                                  [--use-existing-snapshot {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]

commands.name: az netappfiles account backup-vault backup delete
commands.summary: Delete a Backup under the Backup Vault.
commands.syntax:
az netappfiles account backup-vault backup delete [--account-name]
                                                  [--backup-name]
                                                  [--backup-vault-name]
                                                  [--ids]
                                                  [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                  [--resource-group]
                                                  [--subscription]
                                                  [--yes]

commands.name: az netappfiles account backup-vault backup delete
commands.summary: Delete a Backup under the Backup Vault.
commands.syntax:
az netappfiles account backup-vault backup delete [--account-name]
                                                  [--backup-name]
                                                  [--backup-vault-name]
                                                  [--ids]
                                                  [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                  [--resource-group]
                                                  [--subscription]
                                                  [--yes]

commands.name: az netappfiles account backup-vault backup list
commands.summary: List all backups Under a Backup Vault.
commands.syntax:
az netappfiles account backup-vault backup list --account-name
                                                --backup-vault-name
                                                --resource-group
                                                [--filter]
                                                [--max-items]
                                                [--next-token]

commands.name: az netappfiles account backup-vault backup list
commands.summary: List all backups Under a Backup Vault.
commands.syntax:
az netappfiles account backup-vault backup list --account-name
                                                --backup-vault-name
                                                --resource-group
                                                [--filter]
                                                [--max-items]
                                                [--next-token]

commands.name: az netappfiles account backup-vault backup restore-file
commands.summary: Restore the specified files from the specified backup to the active filesystem.
commands.syntax:
az netappfiles account backup-vault backup restore-file --destination-volume-id
                                                        --file-list
                                                        [--account-name]
                                                        [--backup-name]
                                                        [--backup-vault-name]
                                                        [--ids]
                                                        [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                        [--resource-group]
                                                        [--restore-file-path]
                                                        [--subscription]

commands.name: az netappfiles account backup-vault backup restore-file
commands.summary: Restore the specified files from the specified backup to the active filesystem.
commands.syntax:
az netappfiles account backup-vault backup restore-file --destination-volume-id
                                                        --file-list
                                                        [--account-name]
                                                        [--backup-name]
                                                        [--backup-vault-name]
                                                        [--ids]
                                                        [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                        [--resource-group]
                                                        [--restore-file-path]
                                                        [--subscription]

commands.name: az netappfiles account backup-vault backup show
commands.summary: Get the specified Backup under Backup Vault.
commands.syntax:
az netappfiles account backup-vault backup show [--account-name]
                                                [--backup-name]
                                                [--backup-vault-name]
                                                [--ids]
                                                [--resource-group]
                                                [--subscription]

commands.name: az netappfiles account backup-vault backup show
commands.summary: Get the specified Backup under Backup Vault.
commands.syntax:
az netappfiles account backup-vault backup show [--account-name]
                                                [--backup-name]
                                                [--backup-vault-name]
                                                [--ids]
                                                [--resource-group]
                                                [--subscription]

commands.name: az netappfiles account backup-vault backup update
commands.summary: Update a backup under the Backup Vault.
commands.syntax:
az netappfiles account backup-vault backup update [--account-name]
                                                  [--add]
                                                  [--backup-name]
                                                  [--backup-vault-name]
                                                  [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                  [--ids]
                                                  [--label]
                                                  [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                  [--remove]
                                                  [--resource-group]
                                                  [--set]
                                                  [--subscription]

commands.name: az netappfiles account backup-vault backup update
commands.summary: Update a backup under the Backup Vault.
commands.syntax:
az netappfiles account backup-vault backup update [--account-name]
                                                  [--add]
                                                  [--backup-name]
                                                  [--backup-vault-name]
                                                  [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                  [--ids]
                                                  [--label]
                                                  [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                  [--remove]
                                                  [--resource-group]
                                                  [--set]
                                                  [--subscription]

commands.name: az netappfiles account backup-vault backup wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
commands.syntax:
az netappfiles account backup-vault backup wait [--account-name]
                                                [--backup-name]
                                                [--backup-vault-name]
                                                [--created]
                                                [--custom]
                                                [--deleted]
                                                [--exists]
                                                [--ids]
                                                [--interval]
                                                [--resource-group]
                                                [--subscription]
                                                [--timeout]
                                                [--updated]

commands.name: az netappfiles account backup-vault backup wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
commands.syntax:
az netappfiles account backup-vault backup wait [--account-name]
                                                [--backup-name]
                                                [--backup-vault-name]
                                                [--created]
                                                [--custom]
                                                [--deleted]
                                                [--exists]
                                                [--ids]
                                                [--interval]
                                                [--resource-group]
                                                [--subscription]
                                                [--timeout]
                                                [--updated]
